author: yiweizhang1025
title: Data sharing for medical AI
description: limited amount of experimental data in one company leads to ignorance of rare-events. This is risky for AI performance.

assessments.note: The challenge appear to be clear and interestingly on a right track, but lacks clarity on presenting more information as to a roadmap of how this can be achieved or how it's planned to progress into the solution delineated.

Although the general idea of this proposal has great merit, it is lacking in specifics necessary to assess its suitability for funding. The Fund 4 challenge is to drive adoption of Cardano, so the community needs to know the potential size of this opportunity. What is the potential market size? Number of companies that might find this useful? How many users will your project attract? You need to provide metrics for adoption that help fit your idea into the fund challenge goals
I can not find any plan or roadmap in this one.So i put 1.But as an idea i find it good.But with no plan-no project...
There is not enough information to understand how the proposal will address the challenge.
This is not really a proposal just a vague idea in someone's head... needs a lot more development
It raised a general topic but the problem is too board. It looks like a very ambitious and challenging proposal. It didn't further demonstrate the problem.
Poor explanation. Maybe it's the incorrect challenge for this idea.
There no clarity on what this is all about. No details of the solution provided.
The idea is great and would solve the problem of data privacy in the medical space.
Requires further clarification on how is the solution is planned or what steps are required to develop the project as for its vision.

Expand on the experience of the team members. "Works on blockchain" is not helpful. What projects has that member worked on and what was their role? You write you have "medical AI" experience. Be specific, what is your experience? This project will require significant experience in coding, your proposal doesn't address this at all.
There are no KPI's or detailed plan, which makes your project unfundable as it does not meet the Fund 4 requirements. What about marketing or a go to market plan after development? How will you gain adoption, a key element of the Fund 4 challenge? Provide key milestones and the plan to reach them, as well as whether further funding will be required since the ask of 10,000 is low for a project of this magnitude.
I can not find any plan or roadmap in this one.So i put 1.But as an idea i find it good.But with no plan-no project...
No planning was submitted and the team's experience description doesn't provide details. It is not possible to judge the chance of success of this proposal based on this information
No plan is presented. It's not clear what experience the proposer has to implement this proposal.

It didn't explain clearly about its experience and background of team. It is not clear implementers already or not. There is no breakdown or clear demonstration to explain how the 10000USD will be used.
Relevant experience, according to the idea, but, It's not clear how many members have the team. Lack of plan.
Specific skills and experience required for the project is not demonstrated in the proposal.
Inadequate information is provided  regarding the experience, the team planning and it's relationship to the budget.

No information provided to assess the feasibility and potential of the solution to be integrated in the blockchain. There is the potential experience from the proposer on the AI front but perhaps more developers interested in this project should communicate with the proposer to implement a roadmap with clear goals along the way.

Your proposal does not provide even the basic information to gauge its development feasibility or it's chances of driving adoption of Cardano. The idea is however very good and has the potential to meet the fund 4 challenge goals with the proper team and plan to execute since it could integrate and provide exposure for Cardano to a broad array of companies in an emerging growth area. I look forward to a more fleshed out proposal with detailed team experience, market adoption metrics, and detailed milestones.

There is not enough information to indicate the feasibility or how the proposal will address the challenge. The proposal is a draft and needs to be improved.
No information is provided to assess the feasibility of the proposal or how it would address the challenge
There is no roadmap or milestones to specify step by step plan. The objective is too board and it didn't explain how to assess success.
Lack of detailed plan, metrics, milestones, what the fund will be used for, success criteria, etc.
There no plan and neither the solution in any state to be approved.
No roadmap, milestones or success metrics have been provided.

solution: Establish a blockchain platform to share and synchronise data from different companies, so that all data can be used for all companies' AI.
experience: A teammate works on blockchain. I have medical AI experience.
